item.description:
That it!! Now I am feeling really crabby, after calling no joy on the WX too soon for Wednesday.
how about a crabby Friday night..... Ricks Crabby, Ya that's right Ricks Crabby Cowboy in Montauk....
you got a problem with that! This way we will be ready to come back in July.... or not...

Let's buzz down to Long Island NY to have dinner at Ricks Crabby Cowboy Cafe. It is only a short 69nm flight with a hop across the sound to MTP ($10 ramp fee) and then a walk across the street (well sort of) to a nice spot overlooking the harbor.

http://www.navmonster...

http://www.crabbycowb...

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: TGICF (Thank Goodness its Crabby Friday)
